Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Afghan \Af"ghan\, a. Of or pertaining to Afghanistan. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Afghan \Af"ghan\, n. 1. A native of Afghanistan. [1913 Webster]
2. A kind of worsted blanket or wrap. [1913 Webster]

Afghan adj : of or relating to or characteristic of Afghanistan or its people [syn: {Afghani}, {Afghanistani}] n 1: a blanket knitted or crocheted in strips or squares; sometimes used as a shawl 2: a native or inhabitant of Afghanistan [syn: {Afghanistani}] 3: an Iranian language spoken in Afghanistan and Pakistan; the official language of Afghanistan [syn: {Pashto}, {Pashtu}, {Paxto}, {Afghani}] 4: a coat made of sheepskin [syn: {sheepskin coat}] 5: tall graceful breed of hound with a long silky coat; native to the Near East [syn: {Afghan hound}]
